name: Welcome Email for New Customers
description: Automatically send a welcome email when someone signs up

trigger.description: Your website calls this URL when someone signs up

steps.details: Extract name, email, signup date from the webhook
Insert customer name and custom welcome message
Send welcome email with your company branding
Create new contact in your customer database

workflow.business_value: Never miss welcoming a new customer

name: Daily Sales Report
description: Send daily sales summary to your team

steps.details: Get yesterday's sales data from your system
Sum revenue, count orders, identify top products
Build nice-looking table with charts
Post report to #sales-team channel
Send detailed report to management team

workflow.business_value: Keep everyone informed without manual work

name: Social Media Auto-Post
description: Share new blog posts across all social platforms

trigger.description: Monitors your blog for new posts

steps.details: Check RSS feed every 15 minutes for new content
Get title, summary, featured image, and link
Adapt content for Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook formats
Share with relevant hashtags and shortened link
Professional version with company page mention
Queue for optimal posting time

name: Customer Support Ticket Automation
description: Automatically process and route support emails

steps.details: Use AI to categorize: Bug, Feature Request, or General Question
Add to your helpdesk system with proper category
Acknowledge receipt and provide ticket number
Assign to developer, product manager, or support agent
Alert assigned team with ticket details

workflow.business_value: Faster response times and better organization

name: Inventory Low Stock Alert
description: Monitor inventory and alert when items are running low

steps.details: Get current stock levels for all products
Compare with predefined low-stock warnings
Create list of items below minimum stock
Email purchasing team with critical low-stock items
Post summary to inventory management Slack channel
